definition: can't keep up with/can't catch up with/cannot overtake
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
lit. if you were eating warm shit, it'd be stone cold by the time you finished it (idiom)/fig. (of a person) too slow/can't keep up
pinyin: chi1 shi3 dou1 gan3 bu5 shang4 re4 hu5 de5

sentences.english: She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
sentences.chinese: 她總覺得自己命薄，趕不上好機會。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or you won't keep up with them.
sentences.chinese: 快點，否則你就趕不上他們了。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or you'll miss the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 趕快，否則你就趕不上早班車。

sentences.english: It is not the fourth size of one of your least provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家還趕不上你最小的省四分之一的面積。

sentences.english: No writing whimsical stuff that's off-topic.
sentences.chinese: 不要去寫那些趕不上潮流的古怪文章。

sentences.english: Luckily, you reminded me, otherwise I would have missed the train.
sentences.chinese: 虧得你提醒了我，否則我就趕不上火車了。

sentences.english: "We cannot cut costs fast enough to offset that revenue loss, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“我們減低成本的速度趕不上收入下降的速度。

sentences.english: Please confirm asap, so that we could arrange the shipment before Jul. 1st.
sentences.chinese: 請儘快確認，不然可能趕不上7月1日前出運。

sentences.english: The exhibition didn't measure up to the last year's.
sentences.chinese: 這屆展覽趕不上去年的那一屆。

sentences.english: Getting up late means missing the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 起牀晚了意味着趕不上早車。

sentences.english: What if I miss my flight?
sentences.chinese: 如果趕不上班機怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Youd better get up early tomorrow morning, otherwise you will be late for the train.
sentences.chinese: 你明早最好早起，否則就趕不上火車了。

sentences.english: Take has lagged behind the increased outgo .
sentences.chinese: 收入趕不上增加的支出。

sentences.english: I can't. I'm already behind schedule.
sentences.chinese: 不行啊，我已經趕不上進度了。

sentences.english: You must hurry or you'll miss the last bus.
sentences.chinese: 你必須快點，不然的話就趕不上末班汽車了。

sentences.english: Wang Li ran fast I couldn't catch up with him.
sentences.chinese: 王力跑得如此快，以致於我趕不上他。
